trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in Myrtle Beach on or around October 13th 2011
divs: sighting detailsas i was driving over hwy 544 bridge in myrtle beach, sc 10\13\11 at approximately 8:26pm i noticed 3 orange circle lights appear (equal distant apart). as one faded away another would appear. i saw as many as 4 at one time. as the four faded away another cluster of 3 appear for a few seconds and then they faded away. the event lasted for about 20 seconds. i kept looking for them to reappear but no lights showed back up as i was driving.
Summary: 3 orange circle lights appear and fade, 4 at the most appear at one time and then fade away
